title: Calories in a Candy Cane
meta_description: Discover calories in a candy cane, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per piece, plus tweaks and FAQs for holiday treats.
assumptions: Standard 15 g peppermint hard candy cane, no fillings or coatings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, flavor, and ingredients; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard candy cane provides ~60 kcal, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a candy cane?
faqs.a: About 60 kcal for a standard 15 g piece.

faqs.q: Are candy canes high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, nearly all 15 g carbs are sugars with no fiber.

faqs.q: Do candy canes have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g fat and 0 g protein per candy cane.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a candy cane?
faqs.a: Usually 0 mg, but flavored varieties may vary slightly.

faqs.q: How do mini candy canes compare?
faqs.a: Mini versions have ~30 kcal, half the standard size.
